name: Voxelotl Garden
description:
Voxelotl are a special breed of creature that live a simple and joyful life. They live together on a simple island that provides them with all the comforts they need to survive. They have plenty of food and water, as well as places to hide if things get scary. Voxelotl are not the same breed as the traditional Axolotl in the sense that they have the unique ability to live on land. You have a special opportunity to raise some of your very own Voxelotl and earn their love and respect. Help give your new friends a life full of companionship, love, and entertainment!

Personalities

Each Voxelotl has a unique personality. Some Voxelotl may be social and some may simply want to hide from any action. Spend time with your Voxelotl to learn more about them!

Breeding

Ensure that dominant features are passed on by breeding parents with the same features. Ensure a new feature not found in either parent by breeding parents with different features. Breed to get the perfect Voxelotl!

Interact with Voxelotls

Feed them.

Play with them.

Manage hunger.

Manage sleepiness.

Change clothing.

Teach them new tricks such as dancing, singing, playing instruments, drawing, and more!

Voxelotl Goals

Voxelotl have their own goals and they need your help to achieve them. Achieving goals helps increase your bond with the Voxelotl and can also earn you some prizes.

Purchase from the store

Purchase hats, special consumable items, or educational books for teaching Voxelotl new tricks.

Training Stations

Each training station increases the creature’s skills and makes them more likely to succeed in competitions!

There are four training stations placed in the garden. Help your Voxelotl grow stronger and win in competitions!

Decorations

Purchase decorations from the store and customize your garden. You can place decorations anywhere in the garden to make it feel more like home!

Racing Minigame

Test the skills of your creature by entering them in the racing competition! Skills boost your Voxelotl in certain zones of races for a competitive edge based on their trained skills. Win races for unique prizes!
